name: Goat Unlimited
description:
Uh-oh. Now you've done it! A genetically modified goat has just escaped from the lab. He has super powers that get him into plenty of hot water. Smash cars, planes, fire hydrants, people, and anything else not attached to the ground. Help this goat grow from a Baby Goat in Level 1 to an Ultra Giant Goat in Level 200. This game combines elements of rampage style games with adventure games. Complete all 48 missions and over 20 achievements. Try to rank in the Top 10 in the world!

Features:
--6 Huge Maps
--48 Missions
--Loads of achievements
--World Rankings of your Goat
--Combines rampage with adventure
--Excellent 3D graphics and fast gameplay
--The more you play, the more he grows

If you ever wondered what it would be like to take control of a Goat, this is your chance. Not the greatest game ever, but we enjoyed making it.

Notes: At this point, level 200 is max size for the goat - -and he will be a Super Giant at level 200. This app works best on newer devices.

Connect with us @jellyfishgiant

Enjoy!
